text: Wata on resu ɓen rewɓe shirkayɓe haa ɓe gomɗina: Mi Woondii ko korɗo gomɗinɗo ɓuri moƴƴude debbo shirkoowo hay si o haawnii on. Wata on resin ɓen worɓe shirkooɓe haa ɓe gomɗina: Mi Woondii ko maccuɗo gomɗinɗo ɓuri moƴƴude dimo shirkoowo hay si o haawnii on.Ɓen ɗon hiɓe nodda faade e yiite, Alla No Noddude e Aljanna e haforanal, e duŋyee Makko. Himo Ɓaŋngina Aayeeje Makko ɗen wonannde yimɓe ɓen, belajo'o ɓe wa'ajitoto
